key.description: Identifier used for accessing specific environments from code.

area.description: The area the environment should apply in.

description.description: Optional description of what this changes or why.

isUnderwater.description: Whether the area is an underwater area, such as Guardians of the Rift.

force.description: Whether to force the environment to apply, even if atmospheric lighting is disabled.

allowSkyOverride.description: Whether to allow overriding the sky with default sky.

lightningEffects.description: Whether the area should have flashing lightning effects.

instantTransition.description: Whether transitions to and from this area should always be instant.

ambientColor.description: Ambient light color in sRGB, specified as a hex color code or an array in the range 0-255. Accepts decimals.

ambientStrength.description: Ambient light strength multiplier. Defaults to 1.

directionalColor.description: Directional light color in sRGB, specified as a hex color code or an array in the range 0-255. Accepts decimals.

directionalStrength.description: Directional light strength multiplier. Defaults to 0.25.

waterColor.description: Water color in sRGB, specified as a hex color code or an array in the range 0-255. Accepts decimals.

waterCausticsColor.description: Water caustics color in sRGB (as hex or array). Defaults to the environment's directional light color.

waterCausticsStrength.description: Water caustics strength. Defaults to the environment's directional light strength.

underglowColor.description: Underglow color in sRGB (as hex or array). Acts as light emanating from the ground.

underglowStrength.description: Underglow strength multiplier. Acts as light emanating from the ground.

sunAngles.description: The sun's altitude and azimuth specified in degrees in the horizontal coordinate system. Altitude is from the ground up, azimuth is clockwise from north.

fogColor.description: Sky/fog color in sRGB, specified as a hex color code or an array in the range 0-255. Accepts decimals.

fogDepth.description: Fog depth normally ranging from 0 to 100, which combined with draw distance decides the fog amount. Defaults to 25.

groundFogStart.description: Only matters with groundFogOpacity > 0. Specified in local units (1 tile = 128 units), where zero is the lowest height, and larger negative numbers are further up. Defaults to -200.

groundFogEnd.description: Only matters with groundFogOpacity > 0. Specified in local units (1 tile = 128 units), where zero is the lowest height, and larger negative numbers are further up. Defaults to -500.

groundFogOpacity.description: Ground fog opacity ranging from 0 to 1, meaning no ground fog and full ground fog respectively. Defaults to 0.
